members.member: eventReceiver: The class that handles events fired by the BlueToothSession. This class is responsible for any UI-messages/interaction concerning the state of the bluetooth connection It also signals the class responsible for communications to start or stop communications

member.name: T:PalmSens.PSAndroid.Comm.DeviceListActivity
member.summary: This Activity appears as a dialog. It lists any paired devices and devices detected in the area after discovery. When a device is chosen by the user, the MAC address of the device is sent back to the parent Activity in the result Intent.

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.Comm.DeviceListActivity.DoDiscovery
member.summary: Start device discover with the BluetoothAdapter

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.Comm.DeviceListActivity.DeviceListClick(System.Object,Android.Widget.AdapterView.ItemClickEventArgs)
member.summary: The on-click listener for all devices in the ListViews

member.name: E:PalmSens.PSAndroid.Comm.ThreadedReadDevice.DeviceReadError
member.summary: An event handler that will fire when the device has a read error.

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.Comm.ThreadedReadDevice.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of device resources Identical to Close()

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.Comm.ThreadedReadDevice.InternalRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Read data from the device, does not support the cancellation of blocking reads.

members.member: eventReceiver: The class that handles events fired by the USBSession. This class is responsible for any UI-messages/interaction concerning the state of the usb connection It also signals the class responsible for communications to start or stop communications

member.name: T:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions
member.summary: Functions for saving and loading files. - Working with relative paths - Save rich text to single line -...

member.name: P:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.AssemblyDirectory
member.summary: Gets the assembly directory.

member.name: F:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.LoadMethodDialogFilter
member.summary: Use as filter for load method file dialog

member.name: F:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.PrevLoadDialogPath
member.summary: The default dialog path for loading files

member.name: F:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.PrevSaveDialogPath
member.summary: The default dialog path for saving files

member.name: F:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.CurrentPath
member.summary: The path of the current file to use for relative paths

member.name: F:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions._backGroundWorker
member.summary: The back ground worker

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.MakeRelative(System.String)
member.summary: Makes an absolute path relative to the location of the file

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.ShortenPathForDisplay(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shortens the path for display.
member.param: Max length of the string. Default is 60 characters, minimum is 20 characters
member.returns: A path with a \...\ parts in it if longer than maxLength

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.SaveStringToFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the string to the given filepath using the default encoding from DataFile.DefaultEncoding

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.SaveStringToFile(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Saves the string to the given filepath

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.MakeAbsolute(System.String)
member.summary: Makes an absolute path relative to the location of the file

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.GetNextAvailableDataFilename(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the next available data filename. Returns a filepath as filepath-#.extension, where # is an incremental number.

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.GetValidFilename(System.String)
member.summary: Filters out invalid characters and returns cleaned filename.

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.LoadMethod(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the method. Allowed extensions: .psmethod, .pst and .pss
member.param: if set to true [is corrosion]. This is only required for old style method files with extension .pmt and .pms.

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.LoadCurve(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the curve and tries to load the corresponding method file if exists.

member.name: M:PalmSens.PSAndroid.LoadSaveHelperFunctions.LoadMuxMeasurementFile(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the mux measurement file and tries to load the corresponding method file if exists.
member.returns: Measurement with curve data and corresponding method parameters
